title: Week 9 Preview: Chiefs-Titans, Bucs-Rams, Dolphins-Bears | The Ringer NFL Preview Show
description:
Danny, Ben, and Steven preview Week 9 starting with a battle between two AFC division leaders in the Chiefs and Titans. They discuss why the Titans have had past success against the Chiefs and if that will continue this week (2:43). Then they talk about the Bucs-Rams game and why these two teams are struggling right now. Later they predict the Monday morning headlines for Dolphins-Bears, Chargers-Falcons, and more (26:33).

Hosts: Ben Solak, Danny Heifetz, Steven Ruiz
Associate Producer: Isaiah Blakely
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
